<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update the trash bin auto-clearing setting"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/settings/autocleanup"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the trash bin auto-clearing setting.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"set":{"description":"Enables the auto-clearing or not","type":"boolean"},"gap":{"description":"A time interval when the auto-clearing will be performed (one week, two weeks, one month, two months, three months)","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The auto-clearing setting properties","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"IsAutoCleanUp":{"type":"boolean"},"Gap":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","enum":["OneWeek","TwoWeeks","OneMonth","TwoMonths","ThreeMonths"],"description":"[1 - OneWeek, 2 - TwoWeeks, 3 - OneMonth, 4 - TwoMonths, 5 - ThreeMonths]"}},"title":"AutoCleanUpData"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
